meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeff Huong Mike Lonesky Brendan O'Connor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6450.

td.p: Jeff Huong, a recent law-school graduate from Sandy Springs, Georgia
Mike Lonesky, a federal investigator from Clinton, New York
Brendan O'Connor, an Internet security engineer from San Francisco, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,201)

tr.td: 50th ANNIVERSARIES IN MUSIC
THE NAME OF THE WIND
"C_N_N"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "C", and there will be at least two "N"s in the rest of the word.)
A COLORFUL CATEGORY
MISSOURI LOVES COMPANIES
LITERATURE QUOTES: ONE WORD OFF
(Alex: You have to give us the correct word.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The Rolling Stones formed in 1962, when this lead vocalist was a lad of 18')

tr.td: The Rolling Stones formed in 1962, when this lead vocalist was a lad of 18

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Brendan
Mike
Jeff
YOU HAD ME AT SHALOM
FASHION
A RIVER RUNS TO IT
(Alex: We're obviously inspired by a movie in [*]--not through it.)
PUTTING THE "POP" IN POP CULTURE
HOMOPHONES
AFRICAN-AMERICAN INVENTORS
I'm Kareem Abdul-Jabar with clues about the lost history of African-American inventors from my book "What Color Is Your World?"
